body_html: Is there a way to randomly rotate images, a random_rotation similar to random_saturation for augmentation purposes? I've looked and looked and can't seem to find anything for such an obvious use case.
body_text: Is there a way to randomly rotate images, a random_rotation similar to random_saturation for augmentation purposes? I've looked and looked and can't seem to find anything for such an obvious use case.
body: Is there a way to randomly rotate images, a `random_rotation` similar to `random_saturation` for augmentation purposes? I've looked and looked and can't seem to find anything for such an obvious use case.
